name: places/ChIJ5bUKnbpYwokRULU264Z0bi8
formattedAddress: 407 E 88th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 407 E 88th St, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: For the past 3 years I have endured the worst living conditions of my life for an overpriced studio apartment at the 315 e 95th location. Beware single women! I have experienced tenant harassment to the highest degrees here. The small pool of supers, building employees and realtors circulating the company are unprofessional and negligent crooks! The building is filthy crowded with a roach infestation that heats up in the summer along with rats that scurry along the first floor and the basement. The basement has a laundry room if you can tolerate the stench, but there is permanent animal hairs in the washer's drum. I understand financial hardships but if you can, DO NOT SIGN A LEASE WITH RENT MANHATTAN!

originalText.text: Extremely unprofessional! They give your hope in the beginning if you are applying for an apt. You pay a fee of $500 they will not accept you and they will keep the deposit. Stay away from this people. Find another broker. My example, I applied with a friend to be on the lease both of us, they made us to fill two different applications, and pay $500 for the deposit. After 5 days asking for both of us to bring papers and all the documents they didn’t accept my friend on the lease but only me. We want both to be on the lease since day one.( they knew that) We applied together but “ different application” bc they made us do this way. Now they want to keep our deposit.  I was talking to a Assistant broker name Paul who is extremely sarcastic and unprofessional. I feel because I have an accent I was treated differently. Stay away!!!
